title: Who danced the best on the song 'Pinga' from Bajirao Mastani, Deepika or Priyanka? - Quora

Pinga was traditional marathi dance form song from movie Bajirao Mastani , tthe stunning looks and dance moves by Priyanka Chopra and Deepika Padukon added a classical colours to it , with choreography by Remo D’Souza . The song was filmed on womens haldi-kumkum program in film. Judging the dance is very difficult task when you have such a talented cast filming it. But as per my observations , the costumes suited Priyanka much better than Deepika (due to her height) and thats the only reason Priyanka’s moves looked from clean thn Deepika . Here's the rating for the song: Priyanka Chopra : 9.4/10 Deepika Padukon : 9.2/10
